content:
Can somebody look at #13540? This does two things:

  • it moves NumberTheory.LegendreSymbol.Gausssum to NumberTheory.GaussSum (first commit)
  • it deals with some porting notes in that file and cleans (and speeds) it up a bit (further commits)

I'm planning some further cleaning-up of material around multiplicative characters, and for this it would be good to have the cleaned-up version of this GaussSums file in first.
It seems fine on github in this case, but in general I'd avoid moving code and changing it in the same PR

:ping_pong:

If desired, I can reinstate the nonrec at MulChar.IsQuadratic.gaussSum_frob; I just would like to get this out of the way. (I think the move and the other changes should be uncontroversial.)
I just realized that #13540 still had the "WIP" label. It is now removed.
It also had acquired a merge conflict while I was not looking (which is now resolved).
